name: Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc.
description: Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company that operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, The Fidelity Deposit and Discount Bank. Founded in 1903 and headquartered in Dunmore, Pennsylvania, the company provides a range of financial services, including commercial and retail banking, mortgage and consumer lending, and investment services. Fidelity D & D Bancorp is committed to delivering personalized banking solutions and exceptional customer service, catering to both individual and business clients. The bank focuses on building long-term relationships with its customers and offers products such as checking and savings accounts, loans, credit cards, and wealth management services. As a community-focused institution, it emphasizes local investment and support for regional economic development. The company has been recognized for its financial strength and stability, maintaining a strong capital position and prudent risk management practices. Fidelity D & D Bancorp continues to innovate its banking services, incorporating digital banking features to enhance customer convenience while upholding its values of integrity and transparency. The company aims to provide a holistic banking experience that meets the evolving needs of its clients while fostering community growth and financial literacy.

seo.meta_title: Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc., a community-focused bank providing personalized banking solutions, investment services, and exceptional customer service.

faq.question: What services does Fidelity D & D Bancorp offer?
faq.answer: Fidelity D & D Bancorp offers personal and commercial banking services, investment services, mortgage and consumer lending.

faq.question: Where is Fidelity D & D Bancorp headquartered?
faq.answer: Fidelity D & D Bancorp is headquartered in Dunmore, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fidelity D & D Bancorp?
faq.answer: Daniel J. Santaniello is the CEO of Fidelity D & D Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: When was Fidelity D & D Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Fidelity D & D Bancorp was founded in 1903.
